review: Doctor has friendly behaviour. He has listening attitude. It was very comfortable to tell doctor about what issue we are facing. Thanks!
doctor is really experienced and understood the problem well. the disgnosis was excellent. my kid felt well within 3 days

review: he is a very nice doctor..explains everything so well..very much satisfied..do refer him for any kind of child problem

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were always reassured that excessive medicines were never prescribed for our child and the doctor would take a holistic approach to treatment. His time-taking explanation of issues is also something that we miss in doctors these days. Our only regret at moving away was not being able to continue with him as our child's paediatrician. Would always recommend Dr. Ghatak to all parents especially first-timers.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind feedback. Keep safe.

review: The doctor patiently listened to our concrn, checked the newborn with professional care and explained the medical condition and the management in an unhurried manner. He is our baby's doctor from now on.
********* ***** *** *** ** *** ********** After three day anti biotics course, there is no respite. Doctor claimed that Medicine will help in a day.
reply_text: You should have reverted back to me if the problem persisted, which you never did.

review: **** **** *******no waiting time Crisp consultation to try point explanations. Every professional attitude
